long_description: LoadStops make it easy to load and transport a canoe, ladder or lumber on a Yakima cartop rack (sold separately). Brackets cushion and prevent the item from shifting while driving at highway speeds. Requires straps or rope (sold separately) for securing to rack. Canoes and other long loads should be securely tied to front and back car bumpers as well as to the rack.
short_description: LoadStops make it easy to load and transport a canoe, ladder or lumber on a Yakima cartop rack (sold separately).
